name: backend

scripts.anomaly-monitor: cd anomaly-detection && source venv/bin/activate && python integration_example.py monitor
scripts.anomaly-check: cd anomaly-detection && source venv/bin/activate && python integration_example.py check
scripts.anomaly-test: cd anomaly-detection && source venv/bin/activate && python integration_example.py test
scripts.anomaly-train: cd anomaly-detection && source venv/bin/activate && python train_models.py
scripts.setup-anomaly: cd anomaly-detection && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt

description: IoT Backend with Anomaly Detection and Push Notifications
